title: The Full List of Trump’s 144 Grants of Clemency
sub_head: Outgoing president pardoned 74 individuals, commuted sentences of 70 others before leaving office
body:
Former President Donald Trumpissued 144 grants of clemency before leaving office, pardoning 74 people and commuting the sentences of 70 others.
Here is the complete list of those actions, according to White House statements released earlier Wednesday, before the swearing-in of President Joe Biden.
Alex Adjmi served five years in prison after being convicted in 1996 of a financial crime.
Fred Keith Alford was convicted in 1977 for a firearm violation and served one year unsupervised probation.
Mahmoud Reza Banki was charged in 2010 with monetary violations of Iranian sanctions and making false statements. The sanctions-related charges were later overturned by a federal appeals court.
